name: A Ball Game
description:
This is a game i made in 5 days, im pretty proud about the result, since i've only been doing programming for 2 months.

How to play:

-The ball(your character) follows your mouse position

-Collect the blue balls that falls down to get points

-If you hit the red balls you die

NB!:

Your score don't save if you exit the game.
